授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to teach students to improve their speaking and listening ability. More specifically, students should improve in these areas:
· Active listening and note-taking
· Conversation and discussion
· Presenting
到達目標:
In this course, students will do the following:
· Listen to people speaking English and answer questions to assess understanding
· Give their opinion in English and support it with reasons and examples
· Participate in pair and group activities
· Have conversations and discussions in English
· Give presentations in English
